YoutubeMetadata.author: BCB2
YoutubeMetadata.title: 2020.08.19 - CB2 Land Use Committee
YoutubeMetadata.shortDescription:
Brooklyn Community Board 2 (CB2)
Land Use Committee
Wednesday, August 18, 2020 // 6:00pm
remote via Webex

00:00:00 - Welcome

00:01:00 - Presentation & Vote: 295 Cumberland Street, Fort Greene Historic District - Jeff Wandersman, Palette Architecture // Application to remove existing rear deck and construct a full-width, rear-yard extension at the garden level with a rooftop deck and stairs to the rear yard, also to modify sidelights at the garden level entrance on the front façade.

00:23:10 - Presentation & Vote: 135 Plymouth Street, Dumbo Historic District - Dan Wood, WORKac; Naila Rosario, BPL; Kat Savage, BPL; Dan Michaelson & Biba Košmerl, Linked By Air // Application to install signage at the Adams Street façade for the Brooklyn Public Library annex.

00:40:10 - Discussion: FY22 District Statement of Needs & Budget Priorities

01:00:00 - Community Forum

01:09:10 - Approval: June 2020 Committee Minutes
01:09:48 - Chairperson's Report
01:27:16 - Motion to Adjourn
